sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SANOK, a circle of the Austrian kingdom of Gallicia, extending over 2151 square miles, containing ten cities, ten market-towns, and 431 villages, with 230,600 inhabitants. The capital is the city of the same name, situated on the river San. It is a poor place, with but little trade, containing a castle, and 220 houses, with 1640 inhabitants. Long. 22. 7. E. Lat. 49.31.5. N.
